amendment.description: Amendment inserts language prohibiting use of funds by public land management agencies from making declarations under the Antiquities Act in counties where there is significant local opposition.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to make a Presidential declaration by public proclamation of a national monument under chapter 3203 of title 54, United States Code in specified counties.
